name: NFT Paint
description:
This NFT is a fun tool to generate your own NFT by simple brushes. Just select your brush then press left mouse button and move mouse pointer (spray) over the page. Also you can use "New" button to clear all and start new one. 
Be innovative and have some fun time and results.

Help
---------------------------------------
Shortcut keys to generate your own NFT:

Key     Action
---     ----------------------------
n       New page
[       minimize brush size
]       maximize brush size
r       change brush to rectangle
c       change brush to circle
t       change brush to triangle
l       change brush to line
a       add smooth movement to your drawing
-------------------------------------------
* you can resize brush size while drawing ( press "[" or "]" + holding mouse button down)
* change brush type and then click "n", to change background style.

:: J u s t       h a v e     f u n  and send me on twitter what you draw.
